verses.verse: It is actually <S%G3654><s%> reported <S%G191><s%> that there is immorality <S%G4202><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, and immorality <S%G4202><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> a kind <S%G5108><s%> as does not exist even <S%G3761><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> that someone <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> his father's wife. <S%G1135><s%>

And you have become arrogant, <S%G5448><s%> and have not mourned <S%G3996><s%> instead, <S%G3123><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that the one who had done <S%G4238><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> deed <S%G2041><s%> might be removed <S%G142><s%> from your midst. <S%G3319><s%>

For I, on my part, <S%G1473><s%> though <S%G3303><s%> absent <S%G548><s%> in body <S%G4983><s%> but present <S%G3918><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> have already <S%G2235><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> him who has so <S%G3779><s%> committed <S%G2716><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I were present. <S%G3918><s%>

In the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> when you are assembled, <S%G4863><s%> and I with you in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> with the power <S%G1411><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

[I have decided] to deliver <S%G3860><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a one <S%G5108><s%> to Satan <S%G4567><s%> for the destruction <S%G3639><s%> of his flesh, <S%G4561><s%> that his spirit <S%G4151><s%> may be saved <S%G4982><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Your boasting <S%G2745><s%> is not good. <S%G2570><s%> Do you not know <S%G3609><s%> that a little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leavens <S%G2220><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%> [of dough]?

Clean <S%G1571><s%> out the old <S%G3820><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> that you may be a new <S%G3501><s%> lump, <S%G5445><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as you are [in fact] unleavened. <S%G106><s%> For Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Passover <S%G3957><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> has been sacrificed. <S%G2380><s%>

Let us therefore <S%G5620><s%> celebrate <S%G1858><s%> the feast, <S%G1858><s%> not with old <S%G3820><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> with the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of malice <S%G2549><s%> and wickedness, <S%G4189><s%> but with the unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread of sincerity <S%G1505><s%> and truth. <S%G225><s%>
I wrote <S%G1125><s%> you in my letter <S%G1992><s%> not to associate <S%G4874><s%> with immoral <S%G4205><s%> people; <S%G4205><s%>

I [did] not at all <S%G3843><s%> [mean] with the immoral <S%G4205><s%> people <S%G4205><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> with the covetous <S%G4123><s%> and swindlers, <S%G727><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> with idolaters; <S%G1496><s%> for then <S%G686><s%> you would have <S%G3784><s%> to go <S%G1831><s%> out of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But actually, <S%G3568><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> to you not to associate <S%G4874><s%> with any <S%G5100><s%> so-called brother <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> he should be an immoral <S%G4205><s%> person, <S%G4205><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> covetous, <S%G4123><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> an idolater, <S%G1496><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a reviler, <S%G3060><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a drunkard, <S%G3183><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a swindler <S%G727><s%> â€“ not even <S%G3366><s%> to eat <S%G4906><s%> with such <S%G5108><s%> a one. <S%G5108><s%>

For what <S%G5101><s%> have I to do with judging <S%G2919><s%> outsiders <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1854><s%>? Do you not judge <S%G2919><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are within <S%G2080><s%> [the church]?

But those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> are outside, <S%G1854><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> judges. <S%G2919><s%> Remove <S%G1808><s%> the wicked <S%G4190><s%> man <S%G4190><s%> from among <S%G1537><s%> yourselves. <S%G4771><s%> <S%G846><s%>
